html {

/* Section Hero */
.hero {

  position: absolute;
  top: var(--spacing-lg);
  right: var(--spacing-lg);
  background-color: var(--color-accent);
  color: var(--color-white);
  padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-md);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: var(--text-xs);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
}

.service-icon {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 3rem;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
  filter: grayscale(0.2);
}

.service-content h3 {
  font-size: var(--text-2xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
  color: var(--color-text-dark);
}

.service-content p {
  color: var(--color-text-light);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2xl);
  line-height: 1.7;
}

.service-features {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.service-features li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: var(--spacing-2xl);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
  color: var(--color-text);
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
}

.service-features li::before {
  content: '‚úì';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  color: var(--color-success);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
}

.service-link {
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
  color: var(--color-primary);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
  position: relative;
}

.service-link::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -2px;
  left: 0;
  width: 0;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  transition: width var(--transition-normal);
}

.service-link:hover::after {
  width: 100%;
}

/* Section Expertise */
.expertise {
  background-color: var(--color-secondary);
  color: var(--color-white);
}

.expertise .section-title {
  color: var(--color-white);
}

.expertise .section-subtitle {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
}

.expertise-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: var(--spacing-6xl);
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: var(--spacing-6xl);
}

.tech-categories {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: var(--spacing-3xl);
  margin: var(--spacing-4xl) 0;
}

.tech-category h3 {
  color: var(--color-accent);
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.tech-stack {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: var(--spacing-md);
}

.tech-item {
  padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-lg);
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.tech-item:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.expertise-metrics {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-top: var(--spacing-4xl);
  padding-top: var(--spacing-3xl);
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.metric {
  text-align: center;
}

.metric-value {
  display: block;
  font-size: var(--text-2xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-black);
  color: var(--color-accent);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
}

.metric-label {
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  opacity: 0.8;
}

.expertise-visual {
  position: relative;
}

.code-preview {
  background-color: var(--color-text-dark);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-2xl);
}

.code-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: var(--spacing-lg);
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.code-dots {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-sm);
}

.code-dots span {
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
}

.code-dots span:nth-child(1) { background-color: #ff5f57; }
.code-dots span:nth-child(2) { background-color: #ffbd2e; }
.code-dots span:nth-child(3) { background-color: #28ca42; }

.code-title {
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
}

.code-content {
  padding: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.code-content pre {
  margin: 0;
  font-family: 'Monaco', 'Menlo', 'Ubuntu Mono', monospace;
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: #e5e7eb;
}

/* Section √Ä propos */
.about-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr;
  gap: var(--spacing-6xl);
  align-items: start;
  margin-top: var(--spacing-6xl);
}

.about-intro {
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
  color: var(--color-text-light);
  line-height: 1.8;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-4xl);
}

.about-values {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: var(--spacing-3xl);
  margin: var(--spacing-4xl) 0;
}

.value-item {
  padding: var(--spacing-3xl);
  background-color: var(--color-neutral);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  border-left: 4px solid var(--color-primary);
}

.value-item h3 {
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
  color: var(--color-text-dark);
}

.value-item p {
  color: var(--color-text-light);
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

.about-cta {
  margin-top: var(--spacing-4xl);
}

.team-highlight {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary), var(--color-primary-dark));
  color: var(--color-white);
  padding: var(--spacing-4xl);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  text-align: center;
}

.team-highlight h3 {
  color: var(--color-white);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-3xl);
}

.team-stats {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.team-stat {
  text-align: center;
}

.team-stat .stat-number {
  display: block;
  font-size: var(--text-2xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-black);
  color: var(--color-accent);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
}

.team-stat .stat-label {
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  opacity: 0.9;
}

/* Section T√©moignages */
.testimonials {
  background-color: var(--color-neutral);
}

.testimonials-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr));
  gap: var(--spacing-3xl);
  margin-top: var(--spacing-6xl);
}

.testimonial {
  background-color: var(--color-white);
  padding: var(--spacing-4xl);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  border: none;
  position: relative;
}

.testimonial::before {
  content: '"';
  position: absolute;
  top: var(--spacing-lg);
  left: var(--spacing-2xl);
  font-size: 4rem;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-family: Georgia, serif;
  line-height: 1;
  opacity: 0.3;
}

.testimonial:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl);
}

.testimonial-content {
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-3xl);
}

.testimonial-content p {
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
  color: var(--color-text);
  line-height: 1.7;
  font-style: italic;
  margin: 0;
  padding-top: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.testimonial-author {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.author-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.author-name {
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  color: var(--color-text-dark);
  font-style: normal;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
}

.author-title {
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  color: var(--color-text-light);
}

.testimonial-rating {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-xs);
}

.star {
  color: var(--color-accent);
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
}

/* Section CTA */
.cta {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary), var(--color-primary-dark));
  color: var(--color-white);
  text-align: center;
}

.cta-title {
  font-size: var(--text-4xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-black);
  color: var(--color-white);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.cta-subtitle {
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-6xl);
  opacity: 0.9;
}

.quick-contact-form {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto var(--spacing-6xl);
}

.form-row {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr auto;
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
  align-items: end;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group select {
  padding: var(--spacing-lg);
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: var(--color-white);
  font-size: var(--text-base);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
}

.form-group input::placeholder {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
}

.form-group input:focus,
.form-group select:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--color-accent);
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
}

.form-group select {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.form-group select option {
  background-color: var(--color-secondary);
  color: var(--color-white);
}

.contact-methods {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-4xl);
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.contact-method {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
  padding: var(--spacing-2xl);
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  text-decoration: none;
  color: var(--color-white);
}

.contact-method:hover {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  color: var(--color-white);
}

.contact-icon {
  font-size: var(--text-2xl);
}

.contact-text {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.contact-text strong {
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
}

.contact-text span {
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  opacity: 0.9;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background-color: var(--color-secondary);
  color: var(--color-white);
  padding: var(--spacing-6xl) 0 var(--spacing-3xl);
}

.footer-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr 1fr;
  gap: var(--spacing-6xl);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-4xl);
}

.footer-brand {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.footer-logo {
  font-size: var(--text-xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-black);
  color: var(--color-white);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.footer-tagline {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.social-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 44px;
  height: 44px;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal);
  text-decoration: none;
}

.social-link:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.social-icon {
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
}

.footer-links {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: var(--spacing-3xl);
}

.footer-column h4 {
  font-size: var(--text-lg);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  color: var(--color-white);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.footer-column ul {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

.footer-column li {
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

.footer-column a {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color var(--transition-fast);
}

.footer-column a:hover {
  color: var(--color-accent);
}

.footer-contact {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  padding: var(--spacing-3xl);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
}

.footer-contact h4 {
  color: var(--color-accent);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.contact-info {
  font-style: normal;
}

.contact-info p {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.footer-bottom {
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  padding-top: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.footer-bottom-content {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.footer-bottom p {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  margin: 0;
}

.footer-legal {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
}

.footer-legal a {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  transition: color var(--transition-fast);
}

.footer-legal a:hover {
  color: var(--color-accent);
}

/* Responsive Design - Mobile First */

/* Tablets et petits √©crans */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  :root {
    --container-padding: var(--spacing-xl);
  }
  
  .hero-stats {
    gap: var(--spacing-4xl);
  }
  
  .services-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
    gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
  }
  
  .expertise-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-4xl);
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .about-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-4xl);
  }
  
  .footer-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-4xl);
  }
  
  .footer-contact {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  :root {
    --container-padding: var(--spacing-lg);
    --header-height: 70px;
  }
  
  /* Navigation mobile */
  .navbar {
    padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--container-padding);
  }
  
  .navbar-toggle {
    display: flex;
  }
  
  .navbar-menu {
    position: fixed;
    top: var(--header-height);
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    background-color: var(--color-white);
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 0;
    padding: var(--spacing-2xl) var(--container-padding);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
    transform: translateX(-100%);
    transition: transform var(--transition-normal);
  }
  
  .navbar-menu.active {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  
  .navbar-menu li {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .navbar-menu a {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    padding: var(--spacing-lg);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  }
  
  /* Hero mobile */
  .hero {
    padding: var(--spacing-6xl) var(--container-padding) var(--spacing-4xl);
    min-height: 90vh;
  }
  
  .hero h1 {
    font-size: var(--text-3xl);
  }
  
  .hero-subtitle {
    font-size: var(--text-lg);
  }
  
  .hero-buttons {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .hero-stats {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
  }
  
  /* Sections mobile */
  section {
    padding: var(--spacing-6xl) 0;
  }
  
  .section-title {
    font-size: var(--text-3xl);
  }
  
  .services-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
  }
  
  .service-card {
    padding: var(--spacing-3xl);
  }
  
  .testimonials-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  /* CTA Form mobile */
  .form-row {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-lg);
  }
  
  .contact-methods {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
  }
  
  .contact-method {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
    gap: var(--spacing-md);
  }
  
  /* Footer mobile */
  .footer-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-3xl);
  }
  
  .footer-links {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-2xl);
  }
  
  .footer-bottom-content {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: var(--spacing-lg);
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .footer-legal {
    justify-content: center;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  :root {
    --container-padding: var(--spacing-md);
  }
  
  .hero h1 {
    font-size: var(--text-2xl);
  }
  
  .section-title {
    font-size: var(--text-2xl);
  }
  
  .btn {
    min-height: 44px;
    padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-xl);
  }
  
  .service-card {
    padding: var(--spacing-2xl);
  }
  
  .team-stats {
    gap: var(--spacing-lg);
  }
}

/* Animation et transitions avanc√©es */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference) {
  .hero {
    animation: fadeInUp 0.8s ease-out;
  }
  
  .service-card {
    animation: fadeInUp 0.6s ease-out backwards;
  }
  
  .service-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
  .service-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
  .service-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
  .service-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
  .service-card:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }
  .service-card:nth-child(6) { animation-delay: 0.6s; }
  
  .testimonial {
    animation: fadeInUp 0.6s ease-out backwards;
  }
  
  .testimonial:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
  .testimonial:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
  .testimonial:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

/* States d'accessibilit√© et focus */
*:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--color-accent);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

.btn:focus {
  outline-color: var(--color-accent);
}

/* Smooth scroll pour les ancres */
html {
  scroll-padding-top: var(--header-height);
}

/* Optimisations print */
@media print {
  .navbar,
  .hero-buttons,
  .cta,
  .footer-social {
    display: none;
  }
  
  body {
    font-size: 12pt;
    line-height: 1.4;
  }
  
  h1, h2, h3 {
    page-break-after: avoid;
  }
}

/* Dark mode support */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {

/**
 * TechPro Solutions - Script Principal
 * Interactivit√© moderne pour site web professionnel
 */

// =====================================
// CONFIGURATION GLOBALE
// =====================================

const config = {
  scrollOffset: 80,
  animationDelay: 100,
  smoothScrollDuration: 800
};

// =====================================
// NAVIGATION MOBILE & HAMBURGER MENU
// =====================================

class MobileNavigation {
  constructor() {
    this.nav = document.querySelector('.main-nav');
    this.navToggle = document.querySelector('.nav-toggle');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    this.body = document.body;
    
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.navToggle) {
      this.navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleMenu());
    }

    // Fermer le menu en cliquant sur un lien
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => this.closeMenu());
    });

    // Fermer le menu en cliquant √† l'ext√©rieur
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (!this.nav.contains(e.target)) {
        this.closeMenu();
      }
    });

    // Gestion responsive automatique
    window.addEventListener('resize', () => this.handleResize());
  }

  toggleMenu() {
    const isOpen = this.nav.classList.contains('nav-open');
    if (isOpen) {
      this.closeMenu();
    } else {
      this.openMenu();
    }
  }

  openMenu() {
    this.nav.classList.add('nav-open');
    this.navToggle.classList.add('active');
    this.body.classList.add('nav-open');
  }

  closeMenu() {
    this.nav.classList.remove('nav-open');
    this.navToggle.classList.remove('active');
    this.body.classList.remove('nav-open');
  }

  handleResize() {
    if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
      this.closeMenu();
    }
  }
}

// =====================================
// SMOOTH SCROLLING
// =====================================

class SmoothScrolling {
  constructor() {
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    // Tous les liens d'ancrage
    const anchorLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]');
    
    anchorLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => this.handleClick(e));
    });
  }

  handleClick(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    const targetId = e.currentTarget.getAttribute('href');
    const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetId);

    if (targetElement) {
      const targetPosition = targetElement.offsetTop - config.scrollOffset;
      
      window.scrollTo({
        top: targetPosition,
        behavior: 'smooth'
      });
    }
  }
}

// =====================================
// ANIMATIONS √Ä LA SCROLL
// =====================================

class ScrollAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.elements = [];
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    // S√©lectionner tous les √©l√©ments √† animer
    const animatableElements = document.querySelectorAll(`
      .service-card,
      .tech-category,
      .value-item,
      .testimonial-card,
      .stats-card,
      .hero-content,
      .section-header
    `);

    animatableElements.forEach((element, index) => {
      this.elements.push({
        element,
        delay: index * config.animationDelay,
        animated: false
      });
    });

    // Observer d'intersection pour d√©clencher les animations
    this.observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => this.handleIntersection(entries),
      {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
      }
    );

    this.elements.forEach(item => {
      this.observer.observe(item.element);
    });
  }

  handleIntersection(entries) {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        const elementData = this.elements.find(item => 
          item.element === entry.target
        );
        
        if (elementData && !elementData.animated) {
          setTimeout(() => {
            entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            elementData.animated = true;
          }, elementData.delay);
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

// =====================================
// FORMULAIRE DE CONTACT
// =====================================

class ContactForm {
  constructor() {
    this.form = document.querySelector('.contact-form');
    this.inputs = [];
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    // R√©cup√©rer tous les champs du formulaire
    this.inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, select, textarea');
    
    // Validation en temps r√©el
    this.inputs.forEach(input => {
      input.addEventListener('blur', () => this.validateField(input));
      input.addEventListener('input', () => this.clearErrors(input));
    });

    // Soumission du formulaire
    this.form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => this.handleSubmit(e));
  }

  validateField(field) {
    const value = field.value.trim();
    const type = field.type;
    const required = field.hasAttribute('required');

    // Supprimer les erreurs existantes
    this.clearErrors(field);

    if (required && !value) {
      this.showError(field, 'Ce champ est requis');
      return false;
    }

    if (type === 'email' && value) {
      const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
      if (!emailRegex.test(value)) {
        this.showError(field, 'Format email invalide');
        return false;
      }
    }

    // Marquer comme valide
    field.classList.add('valid');
    return true;
  }

  showError(field, message) {
    field.classList.add('error');
    field.classList.remove('valid');
    
    // Cr√©er ou mettre √† jour le message d'erreur
    let errorElement = field.nextElementSibling;
    if (!errorElement || !errorElement.classList.contains('error-message')) {
      errorElement = document.createElement('span');
      errorElement.classList.add('error-message');
      field.parentNode.insertBefore(errorElement, field.nextSibling);
    }
    errorElement.textContent = message;
  }

  clearErrors(field) {
    field.classList.remove('error');
    const errorElement = field.nextElementSibling;
    if (errorElement && errorElement.classList.contains('error-message')) {
      errorElement.remove();
    }
  }

  handleSubmit(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    let isValid = true;
    
    // Valider tous les champs
    this.inputs.forEach(input => {
      if (!this.validateField(input)) {
        isValid = false;
      }
    });

    if (isValid) {
      this.submitForm();
    } else {
      // Faire d√©filer vers le premier champ d'erreur
      const firstError = this.form.querySelector('.error');
      if (firstError) {
        firstError.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
        firstError.focus();
      }
    }
  }

  async submitForm() {
    const submitBtn = this.form.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
    const originalText = submitBtn.textContent;
    
    // Indiquer le chargement
    submitBtn.textContent = 'Envoi en cours...';
    submitBtn.disabled = true;

    // Simuler l'envoi (√† remplacer par une vraie API)
    try {
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000));
      
      // Succ√®s
      this.showSuccessMessage();
      this.form.reset();
      this.inputs.forEach(input => {
        input.classList.remove('valid', 'error');
      });
      
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Erreur lors de l\'envoi:', error);
      this.showErrorMessage();
    } finally {
      // Restaurer le bouton
      submitBtn.textContent = originalText;
      submitBtn.disabled = false;
    }
  }

  showSuccessMessage() {
    const message = document.createElement('div');
    message.classList.add('form-message', 'success');
    message.textContent = '‚úÖ Message envoy√© avec succ√®s ! Nous vous recontactons sous 24h.';
    
    this.form.insertBefore(message, this.form.firstChild);
    
    // Supprimer le message apr√®s 5 secondes
    setTimeout(() => message.remove(), 5000);
  }

  showErrorMessage() {
    const message = document.createElement('div');
    message.classList.add('form-message', 'error');
    message.textContent = '‚ùå Erreur lors de l\'envoi. Veuillez r√©essayer.';
    
    this.form.insertBefore(message, this.form.firstChild);
    
    // Supprimer le message apr√®s 5 secondes
    setTimeout(() => message.remove(), 5000);
  }
}

// =====================================
// NAVIGATION STICKY
// =====================================

class StickyNavigation {
  constructor() {
    this.header = document.querySelector('.main-header');
    this.lastScrollY = window.scrollY;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (!this.header) return;

    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => this.handleScroll(), { passive: true });
  }

  handleScroll() {
    const currentScrollY = window.scrollY;
    
    if (currentScrollY > 100) {
      this.header.classList.add('scrolled');
      
      // Masquer/Afficher selon direction de scroll
      if (currentScrollY > this.lastScrollY && currentScrollY > 300) {
        this.header.classList.add('hidden');
      } else {
        this.header.classList.remove('hidden');
      }
    } else {
      this.header.classList.remove('scrolled', 'hidden');
    }
    
    this.lastScrollY = currentScrollY;
  }
}

// =====================================
// EFFETS INTERACTIFS
// =====================================

class InteractiveEffects {
  constructor() {
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    // Effet parallax l√©ger sur le hero
    this.initParallaxEffect();
    
    // Animations des compteurs
    this.initCounterAnimations();
    
    // Effet de typing sur les titres
    this.initTypingEffect();
  }

  initParallaxEffect() {
    const heroSection = document.querySelector('.hero');
    if (!heroSection) return;

    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      const scrolled = window.pageYOffset;
      const rate = scrolled * -0.5;
      heroSection.style.transform = `translateY(${rate}px)`;
    }, { passive: true });
  }

  initCounterAnimations() {
    const statsNumbers = document.querySelectorAll('.stat-number');
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          this.animateCounter(entry.target);
          observer.unobserve(entry.target);
        }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.5 });

    statsNumbers.forEach(number => observer.observe(number));
  }

  animateCounter(element) {
    const target = parseInt(element.textContent);
    const duration = 2000;
    const steps = 60;
    const increment = target / steps;
    let current = 0;

    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      current += increment;
      if (current >= target) {
        current = target;
        clearInterval(timer);
      }
      element.textContent = Math.floor(current);
    }, duration / steps);
  }

  initTypingEffect() {
    const typingElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-typing]');
    
    typingElements.forEach(element => {
      const text = element.textContent;
      element.textContent = '';
      element.style.borderRight = '2px solid var(--color-accent)';
      
      let i = 0;
      const typeWriter = () => {
        if (i < text.length) {
          element.textContent += text.charAt(i);
          i++;
          setTimeout(typeWriter, 100);
        } else {
          // Supprimer le curseur apr√®s la fin
          setTimeout(() => {
            element.style.borderRight = 'none';
          }, 1000);
        }
      };

      // D√©clencher l'effet quand l'√©l√©ment est visible
      const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            setTimeout(typeWriter, 500);
            observer.unobserve(entry.target);
          }
        });
      }, { threshold: 0.5 });

      observer.observe(element);
    });
  }
}

// =====================================
// INITIALISATION GLOBALE
// =====================================

class App {
  constructor() {
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    // Attendre que le DOM soit charg√©
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => this.initializeModules());
    } else {

### REPONSE ASSISTANT #290 - 1. Previous Conversation: {#reponse-assistant-290}

<div class="assistant-message">
1. Previous Conversation:
   The user and I have been building a professional website. The process has covered HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript interactivity. We are currently in "Phase 5," which is dedicated to bug fixing and final polishing. We have previously identified and resolved a bug with a sticky header. The main focus for a significant part of the conversation has been a persistent and difficult bug in the contact form's validation logic, specifically related to the `<select>` dropdown element not clearing its error state correctly.

2. Current Work:
   We are in the final stages of a deep debugging session to fix the `<select>` validation bug. Through a process of elimination and adding `console.log` statements for tracing, we made a critical discovery: the `change` event listener on the `<select>` element was never firing. Instead, the `blur` event was firing first, re-triggering the `validateField` method while the `<select>` value was still empty, which caused the error state to reappear immediately. This identified a race condition between the two event listeners.

   The proposed solution was to refactor the event listener setup to *only* use the `change` event for `<select>` elements and remove the `blur` listener for them entirely. While implementing this fix and cleaning up the debug logs, I introduced several syntax errors (a missing closing brace, duplicated lines). I am currently in the process of correcting these syntax errors. My last action was to remove a duplicated `return true;` statement, but the file linter indicates that more syntax errors are present.

3. Key Technical Concepts:
   - **HTML5:** Forms, semantic tags, specifically the `<select>` and `<option>` elements with a default empty `value` option.
   - **CSS:** Class-based styling for dynamic UI states like `.error` and `.valid`.
   - **JavaScript:**
     - **ES6 Classes:** The entire JS logic is structured in classes (`App`, `ContactForm`).
     - **DOM Manipulation:** `document.querySelector`, `querySelectorAll`, `classList`, `nextElementSibling`.

## ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURATION SERVEUR
